ISSUE.TITLE: Enable to NOT store in the database some build parameter
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Idea is to either use a convention (`UNSAFE_*`?) or let it be configurable in the UI but the overall goal is to NOT store in the database - and therefore not enable to retrieve it with the API or direct access - the parameters used to trigger a job. It is likely a filter to implement in https://github.com/harness/drone/blob/master/store/build/scan.go#L102.
